every.description: Repeat every X milliseconds. Example: 60000 for every minute

startDate.description: ISO string or timestamp when to start repeating. Example: "2025-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" or Date.now()

endDate.description: ISO string or timestamp when to stop repeating. Example: "2025-12-31T23:59:59.999Z"

limit.description: Maximum number of times to repeat. Example: 100

immediately.description: Whether to run the job immediately when created. Default: false

pattern.description: Cron pattern for scheduling. Examples: "0 2 * * *" (daily at 2am), "*/15 * * * *" (every 15 min), "0 9 * * MON-FRI" (weekdays at 9am)

tz.description: IANA timezone for cron pattern. Examples: "UTC", "America/New_York", "Europe/London", "Asia/Tokyo", "Australia/Sydney"
